p: The LeNet neural network achieved an accuracy of 57.5% for the classification of mosquitoes ( Fig 6A). Interestingly, the loss function (2.07) significantly increased during the training of the network, indicating possible overfitting. Table 3 presents the accuracy achieved by this network for each mosquito species. The overall performance of the LeNet neural network during the testing phase (phase 3) was 52.4%.
